Scope Ratings was founded as an independent rating agency in Berlin, Germany, in 2002. It specializes in ratings and research of financial institutions, corporates, structured finance transactions and alternative investment funds across Europe. The rating agency is committed to full transparency and diversity of opinions in the European capital markets. Scope Ratings is registered by ESMA as an official credit rating agency (CRA) to operate in the European Union.
